about_the_game:
What is Ocean Explorer?

It's a game where you adventure around the world by ship, playing with a map.

The Story of Ocean Explorer

In the not-so-distant future, human society, made convenient by the development of AI, began to entrust many matters to AI.
Knowledge, technology, and eventually even the act of thinking were left to AI... until one day, AI suddenly stopped its activities and disappeared.
Humanity, having relied heavily on AI, forgot much of its knowledge and technology.
The remnants of humanity continued to live on, gathering whatever usable items were left.

In the declined world of 2434, players set out to sea in a boat inherited from their parents.
A journey to reclaim the lost information of the world begins.

How to Play Ocean Explorer

You become a sailor and adventure around the world.
Adventuring requires funds for buying bigger ships, food and water for voyages, and money to discover ruins and animals.
Funds can be increased by trading or completing guild requests.
Increase your funds for adventure.



- Discover ports around the world to create a map
- Defeat monsters scattered around the world
- Make a fortune through trade and become wealthy
- Discover ruins and animals to obtain rare information
- Find the polar regions of the world, like Antarctica and deserted islands



Gamepad Controls:


Keyboard & Mouse Controls:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t、2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU、1.6GHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t、2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU、1.6GHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14.2.1
  • Processor: Apple M1またはIntel Corei5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Sillicon M1 または Radeon Pro 555
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14.2.1
  • Processor: Apple M1またはIntel Corei5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Sillicon M1 または Radeon Pro 555
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Ocean Explorer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In
  • Additional Notes: 64 ビットプロセッサとオペレーティングシステムが必要です
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 ビットプロセッサとオペレーティングシステムが必要です

short_description: Journey through the decaying world of 2048. A time for exploration and discovery. The quest begins to reclaim the lost world maps.
